jobDescription: realtor.com is seeking a Sr. Economist for the Economic Research team with very strong analytic and problem-solving ability, skills to extract information from large data, and expertise in delivering findings to the economics team, industry, media, and consumers. The purpose of this role will be to analyze customer, product and transaction data and deliver insights to the team and its stakeholders. The role will report directly to the Chief Economist or Director of Economic Research. Masters degree or Ph.D. preferred.5+ years of hands-on experience in business/data analysis and economic research.
